019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.events.Result;
025import com.plotsquared.core.events.TeleportCause;
026import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
027import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
028import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
031import com.plotsquared.core.util.EconHandler;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlotExpression;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.TaskManager;
036import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
037import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
038import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
039import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
040
041
042@CommandDeclaration(command = "delete",
043        permission = "plots.delete",
044        usage = "/plot delete",
045        aliases = {"dispose", "del"},
046        category = CommandCategory.CLAIMING,
047        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
048        confirmation = true)
049public class Delete extends SubCommand {
050
051    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
052    private final EconHandler econHandler;
053
054    @Inject
055    public Delete(
056            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
057            final @NonNull EconHandler econHandler
058    ) {
059        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
060        this.econHandler = econHandler;
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
065        Location location = player.getLocation();
066        final Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
067        if (plot == null) {
068            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
069            return false;
070        }
071        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
072            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
073            return false;
074        }
075        if (plot.getVolume() > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
076            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_too_large"));
077            return false;
078        }
079        Result eventResult = this.eventDispatcher.callDelete(plot).getEventResult();
080        if (eventResult == Result.DENY) {
081            player.sendMessage(
082                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
083                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Delete")))
084            );
085            return true;
086        }
087        boolean force = eventResult == Result.FORCE;
088        if (!force && !plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
089                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_DELETE)) {
090            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
091            return false;
092        }
093        final PlotArea plotArea = plot.getArea();
094        final java.util.Set<Plot> plots = plot.getConnectedPlots();
095        final int currentPlots = Settings.Limit.GLOBAL ?
096                player.getPlotCount() :
097                player.getPlotCount(location.getWorldName());
098        Runnable run = () -> {
099            if (plot.getRunning() > 0) {
100                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.wait_for_timer"));
101                return;
102            }
103            final long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
104            if (Settings.Teleport.ON_DELETE) {
105                plot.getPlayersInPlot().forEach(playerInPlot -> plot.teleportPlayer(playerInPlot, TeleportCause.COMMAND_DELETE,
106                        result -> {
107                        }
108                ));
109            }
110            boolean result = plot.getPlotModificationManager().deletePlot(player, () -> {
111                plot.removeRunning();
112                if (this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea)) {
113                    PlotExpression valueExr = plotArea.getPrices().get("sell");
114                    double value = plots.size() * valueExr.evaluate(currentPlots);
115                    if (value > 0d) {
116                        this.econHandler.depositMoney(player, value);
117                        player.sendMessage(
118                                TranslatableCaption.of("economy.added_balance"),
119                                TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(value))))
120                        );
121                    }
122                }
123                player.sendMessage(
124                        TranslatableCaption.of("working.deleting_done"),
125                        TagResolver.resolver(
126                                "amount",
127                                Tag.inserting(Component.text(String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis() - start)))
128                        ),
129                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.getId().toString())))
130                );
131                eventDispatcher.callPostDelete(plot);
132            });
133            if (result) {
134                plot.addRunning();
135            } else {
136                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.wait_for_timer"));
137            }
138        };
139        if (hasConfirmation(player)) {
140            CmdConfirm.addPending(player, getCommandString() + ' ' + plot.getId(), run);
141        } else {
142            TaskManager.runTask(run);
143        }
144        return true;
145    }
146
147}
